extraction.title: IRCCloud gets disconnected --> New server that already exists with SSL --> Refusal --> Log out
extraction.comments: The actual issue here is that your server list failed to download so the app shows the default connection dialog that new users see, it's not related to having an existing connection or being disconnected. We're looking into this. This has happened two times in (I think that it was) two weeks. This issue just occurred for the third time. Any instructions on staying logged in?Or can I give you something to help debugging this?
